name: com.unity.ui.builder
description:
UI Builder lets you visually create and edit UI assets (UXML and USS) for use with the UI Toolkit (formally UIElements).

You can open the UI Builder via the main menu: Window > UI Toolkit > UI Builder

Note: In Unity 2019.x, the UI Builder can be found in: Window > UI > UI Builder

samples.description: Main game screen derived from the Unite CPH 2019 Tanks demo.
